meanings.definition: A person who parties wildly and enthusiastically.
meanings.sent1: At the school dance, Sarah was known as the queen of ragers.
meanings.sent2: Last night, we attended a ragers hosted by our neighbors.
meanings.sent3: The ragers at the birthday party were so lively that even the shy kids joined in.
meanings.sent4: Her reputation as a ragers spread like wildfire through the town.
meanings.sent5: The image of a ragers dancing under the disco ball was etched in my memory.

meanings.definition: A wild and enthusiastic party or event.
meanings.sent1: The beach bonfire turned into a ragers as more people arrived.
meanings.sent2: Everyone was talking about the epic ragers thrown by the fraternity.
meanings.sent3: The backyard barbecue turned into a ragers when the music started playing.
meanings.sent4: The city park transformed into a ragers with music, lights, and laughter.
meanings.sent5: The annual block party was the highlight of summer, a true ragers.
